Articles.Content:
Odd issue here, not many mods, MechJeb2, EVE, Real Plume. KSP on latest version as per steam, mods are also latest as per CKAN.

So I launch to an altitude, and go to map "M" to check something or pick up a target. "M" again to go back and my ship is not there !!! It seems like I am looking at the right location but there is no ship, no rocket sounds either. I can do many MechJeb2 manoeuvres with my invisible vessel and all works fine but so far only way to make it visible again is go back to map or tacking station and switch to my ship again.

Has anybody seen something similar, I am just checking if I am missing something obvious like loosing focus/direction for some reason.

Many thanks,

Charles

I have had this happen to me. In my case it turned out to be that, for some reason, when switching back to the flight mode, the view would be zoomed so far out that I can't see the ship.

Try zooming in the next time this happens ('+' on the keyboard or use the mouse wheel).
